Instructions for preparing an afrimesh development environment under Ubuntu

= Dependencies =

Run as required:

  * httpd: 
  {{{
  apt-get install apache2
  }}}
  * radius:   
  {{{
  apt-get install freeradius freeradius-mysql
  }}}
  * mysql:  
  {{{
  apt-get install mysql-server mysql-client mysql-common libmysql++-dev
  }}}
  * net-snmp:  
  {{{
  apt-get install snmp
  apt-get install libsnmp-dev 
  }}}
  * curl:
  {{{
  apt-get install curl
  }}}
  * wget:
  {{{
  apt-get install wget
  }}}

Also download and run:
  * libuci - http://afrimesh.googlecode.com/files/libuci-0.7.3_i386.deb
  * libjson - http://afrimesh.googlecode.com/files/libjson-0.8_i386.deb

After all dependencies have been installed, copy the following files from /usr/local/lib to the ext/lib folder in the afrimesh source directory, before starting the afrimesh build process.
  * libuci.a
  * libuci.so
  * libuci.so.7
  * libjson.a
  * libjson.la
  * libjson.so
  * libjson.so.0
  * libjson.so.0.0.1
